summary: An ordinance relating to the eminent domain proceedings for the condemnation, appropriation and taking of land and other property in Block 6, Replat of 12th Avenue Addition, and in Block 14, Union Addition, for park and playground purposes, pursuant to Ordinance No. 64858; providing for the rejection of the awards therein, for the discontinuance of such proceedings; and for the repeal of Ordinance No. 64858.
